Class DocumentReader

    • docreader.DocumentReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class DocumentReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements GenericReader<java.lang.Integer>
    Reader for an entire Microsoft Word document

    Moritz Dorka

      • DocumentReader

        public DocumentReader(java.lang.String globalPrepender,
                      java.lang.String inputFilename,
                      java.lang.String outputFilename)
        Ordinary constructor
        Parameters:
        globalPrepender - prepender for derived files (image filenames, ...)
        inputFilename - file to process
        outputFilename - file where the output shall be written; existing files will be overridden without warning
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the arguments is null
